title: Hextech Flash doesn't get the cdr from Unsealed spellbook and other cdr items
body:
I thought my  Hextech flash would be down from 20s to 12s by using this;

* Unsealed spellbook 25%
* Cosmic Insight 5%
* Ionian boots of lucidity 10%

for a total of 40% cdr because they are additive.

It clearly shows 12 second cooldown on Hextech flash, but once I use the spell, the timer goes to 20 second.

Is it a bug or just an exception?

replies.body: Ah, yeah, that's a bug. We've got a fix ready, it just missed the cut off for the next patch though. Should be in 7.24 instead.
Have u plan to fix [ultimate hat bug ?](https://www.noelshack.com/2017-46-2-1510663870-bug.png)

> [{quoted}](name=Meddler,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Ags9MVGQ,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-11-16T23:53:16.603+0000)
>
> Ah, yeah, that's a bug. We've got a fix ready, it just missed the cut off for the next patch though. Should be in 7.24 instead.

Can we just delete the entire inspiration tree instead? It's a massive can of worms with inherently unbalance-able runes that encourage further power creep in the game.

It's a very unwise choice to allow most of that tree to exist. Particularly after the coming nerfs to Domination and Sorcery (making assumptions here, they sure better get nerfed) that tree will increase in relative strength. Personal opinion is it's an extremely unwise design and development choice to even allow those things to exist.
imagine annie with a 12 second hexflash. Stay away from them walls, people
whew, it takes 2.5 seconds to fully channel flash.
Thats because those are not summoner spell cdr. that is cdr for abilities. except the 5% from cosmic, that may be a bug.

Spellbook is very explicitly Summoner CDR. Cosmic too, as you said it yourself. And finally, if you look closely Ionian has 2 different passives: the first one is the normal 10% CDR, but it also has another passive that says "10% Summoner Spell CDR"
